00042 void IOHandler::add_poll_interest(int mode) {
00043   struct epoll_event event;
00044 
00045   m_poll_interest |= mode;
00046 
00047   memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00048   event.data.ptr = this;
00049   event.events = EPOLLERR | EPOLLHUP;
00050 
00051   if (m_poll_interest & Reactor::READ_READY)
00052     event.events |= EPOLLIN;
00053   if (m_poll_interest & Reactor::WRITE_READY)
00054     event.events |= EPOLLOUT;
00055 
00056   if (epoll_ctl(m_reactor_ptr->pollFd, EPOLL_CTL_MOD, m_sd, &event) < 0) {
00062   }
00063 }

00067 void IOHandler::remove_poll_interest(int mode) {
00068   struct epoll_event event;
00069 
00070   m_poll_interest &= ~mode;
00071 
00072   memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00073   event.data.ptr = this;
00074   event.events = EPOLLERR | EPOLLHUP;
00075 
00076   if (m_poll_interest & Reactor::READ_READY)
00077     event.events |= EPOLLIN;
00078   if (m_poll_interest & Reactor::WRITE_READY)
00079     event.events |= EPOLLOUT;
00080 
00081   if (epoll_ctl(m_reactor_ptr->pollFd, EPOLL_CTL_MOD, m_sd, &event) < 0) {
00082     HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(EPOLL_CTL_MOD, sd=%d) (mode=%x) : %s", m_sd, mode, strerror(errno));
00083     exit(1);
00084   }
00085 }

00089 void IOHandler::display_event(struct epoll_event *event) {
00090   char buf[128];
00091 
00092   buf[0] = 0;
00093   if (event->events & EPOLLIN)
00094     strcat(buf, "EPOLLIN ");
00095   else if (event->events & EPOLLOUT)
00096     strcat(buf, "EPOLLOUT ");
00097   else if (event->events & EPOLLPRI)
00098     strcat(buf, "EPOLLPRI ");
00099   else if (event->events & EPOLLERR)
00100     strcat(buf, "EPOLLERR ");
00101   else if (event->events & EPOLLHUP)
00102     strcat(buf, "EPOLLHUP ");
00103   else if (event->events & EPOLLET)
00104     strcat(buf, "EPOLLET ");
00105   else if (event->events & EPOLLONESHOT)
00106     strcat(buf, "EPOLLONESHOT ");
00107 
00108   if (buf[0] == 0)
00109     sprintf(buf, "0x%x ", event->events);
00110 
00111   clog << "epoll events = " << buf << endl;
00112 
00113   return;
00114 }

00120 void IOHandler::add_poll_interest(int mode) {
00121   struct kevent events[2];
00122   int count=0;
00123   if (mode & Reactor::READ_READY) {
00124     EV_SET(&events[count], m_sd, EVFILT_READ, EV_ADD | EV_ENABLE, 0, 0, this);
00125     count++;
00126   }
00127   if (mode & Reactor::WRITE_READY) {
00128     EV_SET(&events[count], m_sd, EVFILT_WRITE, EV_ADD | EV_ENABLE, 0, 0, this);
00129     count++;
00130   }
00131   assert(count > 0);
00132     
00133   if (kevent(m_reactor_ptr->kQueue, events, count, 0, 0, 0) == -1) {
00134     HT_ERRORF("kevent(sd=%d) (mode=%x) : %s", m_sd, mode, strerror(errno));
00135     exit(1);
00136   }
00137   m_poll_interest |= mode;
00138 }
00139 
00140 void IOHandler::remove_poll_interest(int mode) {
00141   struct kevent devents[2];
00142   int count = 0;
00143 
00144   if (mode & Reactor::READ_READY) {
00145     EV_SET(&devents[count], m_sd, EVFILT_READ, EV_DELETE, 0, 0, 0);
00146     count++;
00147   }
00148 
00149   if (mode & Reactor::WRITE_READY) {
00150     EV_SET(&devents[count], m_sd, EVFILT_WRITE, EV_DELETE, 0, 0, 0);
00151     count++;
00152   }
00153 
00154   if (kevent(m_reactor_ptr->kQueue, devents, count, 0, 0, 0) == -1 && errno != ENOENT) {
00155     HT_ERRORF("kevent(sd=%d) (mode=%x) : %s", m_sd, mode, strerror(errno));
00156     exit(1);
00157   }
00158 }

00164 void IOHandler::display_event(struct kevent *event) {
00165 
00166   clog << "kevent: ident=" << hex << (long)event->ident;
00167 
00168   switch (event->filter) {
00169   case EVFILT_READ:
00170     clog << ", EVFILT_READ, fflags=";
00171     if (event->fflags & NOTE_LOWAT)
00172       clog << "NOTE_LOWAT";
00173     else
00174       clog << event->fflags;
00175     break;
00176   case EVFILT_WRITE:
00177     clog << ", EVFILT_WRITE, fflags=";
00178     if (event->fflags & NOTE_LOWAT)
00179       clog << "NOTE_LOWAT";
00180     else
00181       clog << event->fflags;
00182     break;
00183   case EVFILT_AIO:
00184     clog << ", EVFILT_AIO, fflags=" << event->fflags;
00185     break;
00186   case EVFILT_VNODE:
00187     clog << ", EVFILT_VNODE, fflags={";
00188     if (event->fflags & NOTE_DELETE)
00189       clog << " NOTE_DELETE";
00190     if (event->fflags & NOTE_WRITE)
00191       clog << " NOTE_WRITE";
00192     if (event->fflags & NOTE_EXTEND)
00193       clog << " NOTE_EXTEND";
00194     if (event->fflags & NOTE_ATTRIB)
00195       clog << " NOTE_ATTRIB";
00196     if (event->fflags & NOTE_LINK)
00197       clog << " NOTE_LINK";
00198     if (event->fflags & NOTE_RENAME)
00199       clog << " NOTE_RENAME";
00200     if (event->fflags & NOTE_REVOKE)
00201       clog << " NOTE_REVOKE";
00202     clog << " }";
00203     break;
00204   case EVFILT_PROC:
00205     clog << ", EVFILT_VNODE, fflags={";
00206     if (event->fflags & NOTE_EXIT)
00207       clog << " NOTE_EXIT";
00208     if (event->fflags & NOTE_FORK)
00209       clog << " NOTE_FORK";
00210     if (event->fflags & NOTE_EXEC)
00211       clog << " NOTE_EXEC";
00212     if (event->fflags & NOTE_TRACK)
00213       clog << " NOTE_TRACK";
00214     if (event->fflags & NOTE_TRACKERR)
00215       clog << " NOTE_TRACKERR";
00216     if (event->fflags & NOTE_CHILD)
00217       clog << " NOTE_CHILD";
00218     clog << " pid=" << (event->flags & NOTE_PDATAMASK);
00219     break;
00220   case EVFILT_SIGNAL:
00221     clog << ", EVFILT_SIGNAL, fflags=" << event->fflags;
00222     break;
00223   case EVFILT_TIMER:
00224     clog << ", EVFILT_TIMER, fflags={";
00225     if (event->fflags & NOTE_SECONDS)
00226       clog << " NOTE_SECONDS";
00227     if (event->fflags & NOTE_USECONDS)
00228       clog << " NOTE_USECONDS";
00229     if (event->fflags & NOTE_NSECONDS)
00230       clog << " NOTE_NSECONDS";
00231     if (event->fflags & NOTE_ABSOLUTE)
00232       clog << " NOTE_ABSOLUTE";
00233     clog << " }";
00234     break;
00235   }
00236 
00237   if(event->flags != 0) {
00238     clog << ", flags=";
00239     if ((event->flags & EV_EOF) || (event->flags & EV_ERROR)) {
00240       clog << "{";
00241       if (event->flags & EV_EOF)
00242         clog << " EV_EOF";
00243       if (event->flags & EV_ERROR)
00244         clog << " EV_ERROR";
00245       clog << "}";
00246     }
00247     else
00248       clog << hex << event->flags;
00249   }
00250   clog << ", data=" << dec << (long)event->data << endl;
00251 }
